com.thindeck.api

Interface Context

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MkContext

    @Immutable
public interface Context
    Context of a step.

    An instance of this interface is passed to one the methods in Step, in order to make it aware of the context it is in.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void log(Level level, String text, Object... args)
      Add log line.
      Memo memo()
      Memo.

    • Method Detail

      • memo

        @NotNull(message="memo can\'t be null")
Memo memo()
          throws IOException
        Memo.

        The method returns a memo that represents the information from the memo of the repository current task is working in. All changes made by a step to this memo should be immediately translated to the memo of the repo.

        Returns:
        Memo of the running repo/transaction
        Throws:
        IOException - If fails

      • log

        void log(Level level,
       String text,
       Object... args)
        Add log line.
        Parameters:
        level - Level of log
        text - Text to log
        args - Optional args
